description:
Meliodas is the captain of the http://anidb.net/ch70760 [Seven Deadly Sins] and the Dragon`s Sin of Wrath. He is the owner of the renowned tavern http://anidb.net/ch70764 [Boar Hat], and the main protagonist of the series. His Sacred Treasure is the Demon Sword Lostvayne and his inherent power is Full Counter. He is more than 3000 years old.
Source: Nanatsu no Taizai Wikia
name: Meliodas
